name: Ninja Vs Zombies (Sam Mifflin)
description:
This a game I created in my first year at university. You can find more of my projects on my Instagram: @Sam_Mifflin.

https://www.instagram.com/sam_mifflin/

In this game you use the arrow keys to avoid the zombies and collect swords to increase your score. Made using processing.

How many can you collect before the time runs out?

I hope you enjoy.
